{"step_by_step_thinking": "The question is asking about the type of studies being conducted. The relevant documents provided are unrelated to cross-sectional studies, so we need to look at the general definition of cross-sectional studies. A cross-sectional study examines a sample of individuals at a single point in time and does not follow them over time. This means that it looks at different individuals but all of the same age group or across different age groups. Therefore, options B and D are possible answers.", "answer_choice": "B"}
